name: Der Schweinemann: Therapist Session (part2)
description:
Welcome to Part II of the "Schweinemann" Trilogy.

In "Therapist Session" you need to escape a creepy therapist in order to break free.

But what lies beneath the Facility? Some Dark Secrets will be unveiled as you encounter  an old foe again... and he's stronger than ever!

Prepare yourself.

This Game was made for the Horror/shitgame Contest last year.

Headphones and dark room recommended :)

If you do make a video of it, please post it here in the comments! I made many other games also so  check them out if you like!
